colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, ,DGE SLONG DE DAG YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,MI RTAG PA NYID KYI MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU RENDRA BODDHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BANDE ZHUNG YE SHES SDES BSGYUR CING ZUS NAS SKAD GSAR BCAD KYIS KYANG BSNAN NAS GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,)` DPAR 'DI KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU YI, HU CAR THU YI KHU RAL TU, ,BSGRUBS PAS THUB BSTAN DAR RGYAS ZHING, ,'GRO KUN MDO 'DI'I DON DON RTOGS SHOG , ,,
